snippet: A lawyer for the banks said MBIA's chief was "pregnant with inside information" on MBIA's pending 2009 restructuring when he bought company stock in the months before the announcement.
abstract: A lawyer for the banks said MBIA's chief was "pregnant with inside information" on MBIA's pending 2009 restructuring when he bought company stock in the months before the announcement.

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and FLOYD NORRIS

headline.main: Lawyer for Banks Accuses MBIA Chief of Insider Trading
headline.print_headline: In Court Exchange, Lawyer for Banks Accuses MBIA Chief of Insider Trading
